title: Sam Asghari
description:
Sam Asghari just finished shooting his very first movie, “Hot Seat!” He talks about working with and learning from Mel Gibson, his love of action movies, stunt training, and his passion for drama and theater. Sam also shares his meet cute with Britney Spears, stories from their first date, thoughts on their wedding, and his hopes for their future!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
